title: 82x13: State Case and Federal Case are “Same Particular Matter” under 18 U.S.C. § 207(a)
summary: A former federal attorney is barred by 18 U.S.C. § 207(a) from representing a state before a federal agency or employee in the state’s prosecution of an individual where the attorney participated personally and substantially in the federal prosecution of the same individual for the same activities.
